?????
I am not Tama-san.
Probably, although I thought that this was your misapprehension, I 
was a little surprised^_^ 
(Possibly, has Tama-san already answered this?) 

The Taiga drama had many bold fictions.
And since it was good at composition, it looked just like the fact.
My parents and friends were convinced that many are historical facts.
When they had asked me for explanation, I suffered troubles very 
much^_^


momoiro-usagi
